messages: a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:57): do we really want to people think it's OK to post messages to public-html and cross-post them to multiple other mailing lists at the same time?
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:04): depends on what other lists, I suppose :-/
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:04): it seems that the www-svg CC is relevant
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:05): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: I'm about to reply to you. should I drop the www-svg CC?
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (09:06): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: it's not bothering me... I'd prefer the SVG community were in on this conversation, myself
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:06): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: ok. I'll keep the CC.
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (09:07): there may come a point where we need to break it off
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (09:07): personally, I don't like the <time> thread being CCed across public-html and whatwg
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (09:07): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: if this is bugging you, feel free to crack the whip
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:08): 227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6: wasn't talking about the www-svg cross-posting, actually
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:08): nor about the <time> thread either
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:09): wonders what the hell that gawds list even is
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:12): does anybody take the word "guild" seriously any more?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:24): anyway, I'm sure the Guild of Accessible Web Designers is a great group of people
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:31): my point was just that cross-posting is usually just not good
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:32): I can't remember saying anything nice today
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (09:34): man, what am I still doing up?
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:34): just stay up and watch the sunrise
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (09:34): make that your goal for the day
227a9a17d1db3f8e5c71a150345fb2a6 (09:35): hey, f86f03d7e99f27ce30d6373cfe093025, you need to update for daylight saving time... it's 4:30
